subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Bicycle Motocross
lead_paragraph: Representing the Olympics’ stab at a youth market more in tune with the X Games, the BMX event displayed an odd mix of bicycle pileups, D.J.’s and ruthlessness.
snippet: Representing the Olympics’ stab at a youth market more in tune with the X Games, the BMX event displayed an odd mix of bicycle pileups, D.J.’s and ruthlessness.
